content.rendered: Oregon Law Group is one of the Pacific Northwest’s premier real estate and corporate transactional law firms. They’re small enough to deliver quick, personal service on every matter, and experienced enough to tackle the most complex deals. They handle everything from the development of skyscrapers to retail leasing. They represent investors, developers, property managers, private equity funds, and entrepreneurs
